extendedInfo.description: Word Weasel is a fast word game where you find as many words as you can from 9 letters in 50 seconds.  Compete with everyone else playing at the same time, a new game starts every minute!"The most fun you can have on your own with 9 random letters. Brilliantly simple, devilishly addictive."--Kim, Android Market commentAd supported, with ability to upgrade to ad-free full version in game.Uses the SOWPODS word list containing 100,000+ words.  They may be obscure, but yes those are words!Change history:- Added a prominent menu button.- Tweak backend communication for more robust multiplayer games.- Fixed a rounding problem where top ratings stalled at 99.1.- Optionally capitalize letters.- Optionally make clear behave like backspace, hold will still clear.- Accept keyboard input where available.- Warn if trying to use the same word twice, can disable via options.- Fix a ratings bug.- Optimize tablet display.- Optionally shake the device to shuffle letters.- Use a simpler, more responsive rating system.- Add a rating, tracking performance over time.  View top rated players!- Leaderboard of high scorers for each round.- Optional offline play to reduce network use (free version still loads ads).- Switch to a more compact dictionary model for a smaller app.- Show all possible words using the given letters.- Improve letter diversity (no more games with four 'A's).

reviews.title: Search for words you already know
reviews.comment: It\'s a lot of fun to get fast at finding words in the 9 letters they give you, but it isn\'t really an advanced vocab or vocab building game.
reviews.author: Bohden Musiel

reviews.comment: Fun and quick
reviews.author: karen guenther

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Great fun!
reviews.author: charles dowdy

reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comment: Keep going back to this game. All time favorite. The very best word game out there.  So much fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Flippin awesome. Its just electronic Boggle, but allows you to see your rank in every game among the players that are playing that particular game with you. No problems, no bugs.
reviews.author: Lindsay Ingram

reviews.title: My Favourite App
reviews.comment: I love this game. I\'ve had it for two months now and I still find I have a lot of fun with it. There can be times when winning becomes too easy, but there is always worthy opponents on at various times of the day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy note, and this game is perfect for the size of the screen. One thing though, I had no idea that I could use letters that were not connected! The instructions were not that specific, at least that I noticed. Otherwise, loads of fun!
reviews.author: Nicole Studioso

reviews.title: Pop goes the weasel !
reviews.comment: A very simple yet highly addictive game. I see I am going to get little work done...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super entertaining!
reviews.comment: Can\'t put it down- even when I should go to bed.
reviews.author: Yashi Naks

reviews.title: Extreme
reviews.comment: I love the game. It is fast and keeps you on your toes. The only prob is I can\'t get the menu. Any suggestions?
reviews.author: Mimi McDavid

reviews.title: Daky
reviews.comment: Love this game when I had another phone and equally enjoy it w/the galaxy s 3 but seem to get the same boards. Very addicting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmmm...
reviews.comment: Don\'t understand how some players always get more words than there actually are according to the table on the screen after the game. Also not sure how much of a word o, aa and similar one and two letter words are. Still addictive though..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and fun...
reviews.comment: Fast paced, and reminiscent of Boggle. Scoring makes sense but the rankings within each round make little sense.
reviews.author: Kim D

reviews.title: In Love!!!
reviews.comment: Im inlove w this game!! A great thinking game. Great for when your bored!! (Well in my case..)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is what I was looking for when it game to word games. Hopefully it will be more popular soon. I like the rating system as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super addictive
reviews.comment: This game has it all small size, online competition and just the right amount of graphics. I\'m loving it!
reviews.author: Nyght Nurse

reviews.title: Love It ! Play It All The Time!!
reviews.comment: best game for word gamer lovers - it is awesome bc the rounds go fast - and is competitive - <3   only one i really ever play these days
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s one of the few games that I play regularly. I\'m glad I installed it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great game, so much fun. If you are a fan if word games, this is a definite download. Excellent :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Favourite Word Game -
reviews.comment: Unobtrusive ads. Quick & fun. Great competitive game. #Chloe# it does show which words you found. Its highlighted in white in the list :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
